channel.title: Tutorial on Passwd.Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Passwd.Blog

item.title: PART 1: Hugo: Installation, Setup and publishing to GitHub pages using a custom domain.
item.description: Introduction This post is somewhat meta, it describes my journey installing hugo, setting up Hugo on my authoring machines and publishing the site to GitHub pages using a custom domain. I will detail both Windows 10 and Ubuntu-19.10 setups. I found a lot of very good information on the web, but found it a bit fragmented and made a lot of assumptions, especially as far as git knowledge is concerned.

item.title: PART 2: Hugo: Installation, Setup and publishing to GitHub pages using a custom domain.
item.description: Introduction This is Part 2 of my journey installing hugo, setting up Hugo on my authoring machines and publishing the site to GitHub pages using a custom domain. I will detail both Windows 10 and Ubuntu-19.10 setups. Click here for Part 1. In Part 1 Installing Hugo Configuring Hugo Creating a Hugo Site Click here for Part 2. In Part 2 Installing Git Setting up GitHub Setting up Git to work with Hugo Installing a Theme Running the site for the first time Pushing all the code to GitHub Click here for Part 3.
